objects.text:
• BIGGEST, BRIGHTEST BUBBLES
• ECO-FRIENDLY & NON-TOXIC
• WON'T STAIN CLOTHING
• HOURS OF BUBBLE FUN

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant banner is divided into four equal quadrants with playful bubble overlays and soft gradient circles for a whimsical appeal. The top-left quadrant sets the stage with the main heading (`heading`), subheading (`subheading`), and tagline (`tagline`) placed over a bright sky-blue background. The top-right quadrant features a bold purple backdrop, elevating the centrally positioned product image (`product_image`) of a bubble solution bottle. The bottom-left quadrant, in a fresh green, displays a list of product benefits (`description`), price (`price`), and a call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) with contrasting purple and white text. The bottom-right section mirrors the sky-blue tone, balancing the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: `#9EDBFF`
- Bright Purple: `#8A2BE2`
- Fresh Green: `#62D962`
- Light Cyan: `#B8E6FF`
- Deep Purple (Text): `#6A0DAD`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Charcoal Grey: `#333333`
product_color: The product image for Gazillion Bubbles uses a vibrant, playful color palette that is perfect for attracting children and evoking fun. Key colors include neon green for the bottle (#7FFC68), bright purple for the cap and label (#893DB8), vivid yellow for the "BUBBLES" text (#FFD230), and rich blue for shadows and outlines (#2A2B99). The "Gazillion" logo blends lime green (#B0FF50) and dark green (#2F892C) within a bubbly cartoon style, creating energy and movement. Bubbles on the label add a glossy, pastel accent with soft blues, pinks, and whites. This combination highlights each element while maintaining visual harmony throughout.
